svg.text: ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ HYPOTHESIS FRAMEWORK │ ├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ │ │ Null Hypothesis (H₀): │ │ andquot;There is NO difference between control and treatmentandquot; │ │ │ │ Mathematically: μ_treatment = μ_control │ │ or │ │ μ_treatment - μ_control = 0 │ │ │ ├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ │ │ Alternative Hypothesis (H₁): │ │ andquot;There IS a difference between control and treatmentandquot; │ │ │ │ Two-tailed: μ_treatment ≠ μ_control │ │ One-tailed: μ_treatment andgt; μ_control (superiority) │ │ μ_treatment andlt; μ_control (non-inferiority) │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
